definition: to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed

sentences.english: Cathaya argyrophylla forest is a famous Tertiary relict phytocommunity-in the world.
sentences.chinese: 银杉林是当今举世瞩目的第三纪残遗植物群落。

sentences.english: There once a boy named Harry. Destined to be a star.
sentences.chinese: 有个男孩叫哈利，他注定要受举世瞩目。

sentences.english: China has scored notable achievements over the past 30-odd years since reform and opening-up.
sentences.chinese: 中国改革开放30多年来，取得举世瞩目的发展成就。

sentences.english: The parades in Beijing in a few days time will be watched worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 十月一日将在北京举行的庆典举世瞩目。

sentences.english: Attracts worldwide attention the Shanghai World Expo is transmitting the intense low-carbon economy information.
sentences.chinese: 举世瞩目的上海世博会传递着强烈的低碳经济的信息。

sentences.english: The Middle Route Project of the South-to-North Water Diversion is a giant project in new century in China.
sentences.chinese: 南水北调中线干线工程是新世纪举世瞩目的宏伟工程。

sentences.english: After many years, a woman he knew rose to a position of world prominence.
sentences.chinese: 多年以后，他所认识的一名女子成为举世瞩目的人物。

sentences.english: In retrospect over the 20th century, the Asia-Pacific region achieved remarkable economic growth.
sentences.chinese: 回首20世纪，亚太地区的经济发展举世瞩目。

sentences.english: Talks between the Chinese and US presidents held in Washington on the 19th have attracted worldwide attention.
sentences.chinese: 中美两国元首19日在华盛顿举行的会谈举世瞩目。

sentences.english: With 30 years of painstaking efforts, we have scored great achievements that have been recognized worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 经过30年艰苦创业，我们取得了举世瞩目的成就。

sentences.english: Alexander Sergeyevich Pushkin is a great author who initiated the literature history of Russia.
sentences.chinese: 普希金是俄国文学史上第一位举世瞩目的伟大作家。

sentences.english: New China holds water 50 years, success of irrigation works construction is brilliant, attract worldwide attention.
sentences.chinese: 新中国成立50年，水利建设成就辉煌，举世瞩目。

sentences.english: The book is, in many ways, a story of remarkable progress.
sentences.chinese: 本书从许多方面描述了中国举世瞩目的发展。

sentences.english: Over the last forty years, our country has made remarkable achievements in science and technology which attract world attention.
sentences.chinese: 四十年来，我国的科技事业取得了举世瞩目的成就。

definition: accomplishment/success/achievement/CL:個|个[ge4]/to achieve (a result)/to create/to bring about
out of the ordinary/unusually (good, talented etc)
ranked number one in the world/the world's first
